Interface SpatialChunkRenderer

All Superinterfaces:
ChartRenderer, SpatialChunkConsumer
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractSpatialLayer, Candlestick3DRenderer, LineSpatialRenderer, SmithChartRenderer, TernaryPlotRenderer, VoxelCloudRenderer
public interface SpatialChunkRenderer extends ChartRenderer, SpatialChunkConsumer
Marker interface for renderers that can consume spatial chunks directly.

Part of the Zero-Allocation Render Path. High-frequency execution safe.

Since:
1.7.0
Version:
1.7.0
Author:
Arber Gashi
